body:
Ah, I just realized that Ning is not free - $25/mth - so that, I believe, kills that option. 

Given that we're leaning towards a wiki-style CMS, I looked for other options[1][2] but MediaWiki so far seems the best. The alternatives tend to be be more complicated to install. 

[Blender](http://wiki.blender.org/) is a good case study. What other wiki-communities are there, that we can use as precedent?

 

[1] [http://www.onlamp.com/pub/a/onlamp/2004/11/04/which_wiki.html](http://www.onlamp.com/pub/a/onlamp/2004/11/04/which_wiki.html)

[2] [http://www.1stwebdesigner.com/design/14-cms-for-wiki-websites/](http://www.1stwebdesigner.com/design/14-cms-for-wiki-websites/)
